tool_description:
Power AI Image processor with labelling, face recognition, text detection, landmark detection, logo detection and image property processing. Using both file stream and URL you can upload an image or provide a URL for fast image processing.

Using Azure Front Door to take advantage of 118 edge locations worldwide and 4 instances in Europe, the US, Asia and Australia, this API’s average time is only 1.2s from post to the downloaded response.
title: Power Image - Label, Detection, Recognition

api_list.name: Alive
api_list.description: Check the AI is alive
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://power-image-label-detection-recognition.p.rapidapi.com/api/imagedetection/status"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "power-image-label-detection-recognition.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Visual image objects from URL
api_list.description:
Visual image objects, this will outline objects in the image and return the image highlighted as seen below
![](https://convertrix.net/OutlineObject.jpeg)

api_list.name: Visual image objects
api_list.description:
Visual image objects, this will outline objects in the image and return the image highlighted as seen below
![](https://convertrix.net/OutlineObject.jpeg)

api_list.name: Text detection
api_list.description:
Optical character recognition (OCR) for an image; text recognition and conversion to machine-coded text. Identifies and extracts UTF-8 text in an image.
Images are optimized for sparse areas of text within a larger image.

api_list.name: Logo detection
api_list.description:
Provides labels for an image
Returns each logo and conference rating.

api_list.name: Text detection from URL
api_list.description:
Optical character recognition (OCR) for an image; text recognition and conversion to machine-coded text. Identifies and extracts UTF-8 text in an image.
Images are optimized for sparse areas of text within a larger image.

api_list.name: Face annotation and points from URL
api_list.description: Provides likelihood ratings for the following explicit content categories: adult, spoof, medical, violence, and racy and gives location on the face.

api_list.name: Image Properties dominant color from URL
api_list.description: Image properties will return the dominant colours in the image provided, you can upload the image via post and this will return an array of dominant colours and there score and pixel cover percent.

api_list.name: Image properties dominant colors
api_list.description: Image properties will return the dominant colours in the image provided, you can upload the image via post and this will return an array of dominant colours and there score and pixel cover percent

api_list.name: Logo detection from URL

Provides labels for an image
Returns each logo and conference rating.

api_list.name: Face annotation and points
api_list.description: Provides likelihood ratings for the following explicit content categories: adult, spoof, medical, violence, and racy and gives location on the face.

api_list.name: Landmark detection from URL
api_list.description:
Provides the name of the landmark and a confidence score.
Gives coordinates for the detected entity.

api_list.name: Landmark detection
api_list.description:
Provides the name of the landmark and a confidence score.
Gives coordinates for the detected entity.

api_list.name: Image labels (contains) from URL
api_list.description: This endpoint will return objects for an image provided from a URL, for each object, a text label and percentage score will be returned.

api_list.name: Image labels (contains)
api_list.description:
This endpoint will return objects for an image provided through POST
For each object, a text label and percentage cent score will be returned.
